text:
SIMPLE & SAFE 
AI Home Camera 
Capture Important Moments For You

WHAT IS AIKEA 
AIKEA is a home camera 
powered by AI  which can 
capture important 
moments automatically 
for you.

5cm 7cm 
SIMPLE & ELEGANT 
AIKEA is built with simple 
concept. The sensor-like  
appearance and shape 
allow you to place it 
anywhere at home.

PRIVACY BY DESIGN 
It is created with built-in AI . 
All intelligent computation 
is done  locally inside AIKEA 
to protect your privacy. 
No cloud collection  of your 
home videos.

MULTIPLE TARGETS 
AIKEA supports detection of 
20+ targets including dogs, 
cats, intruders, cars , babies 
and bicycles . You may easily 
switch between targets 
based on your need.

HOW AIKEA WORKS 
1. AIKEA AI detects the event 
2. An image is sent to your 
Telegram account 
3. Open Telegram and check 
No cloud collection is involved

WHY AIKEA 
AIKEA is a Project We Love on 
Kickstarter  and is 100% 
funded in 2019. It is also the 
only crowdfunded product 
mentioned in the Internet 
Health Report 2019  published 
by Mozilla.
AIKEA USE CASE: CAT TOILET DETECTION

EXPERIENCE 
THE FUTURE 
AIKEA is 100% open-sourced  
and users may customize 
AIKEA in the best you prefer, 
like turning it into a dinosaur. 
All components are compatible 
with Raspberry Pi and are 
reusable in order to reduce the 
electronic wastes .
 Dinosaur case created by Ping-Hsun Chen (Penk)

AIKEA Full Kit 
Get one AIKEA kit to protect your home 
at a discounted rate

AIKEA Light Kit 
With this reward tier, your RPi Laying 
around at home can be an AIKEA !
